name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior Golang Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, focusing on robust cloud-native applications. Proficient in **Golang** and skilled in cloud services such as **Azure** and **AWS**. Expertise in AI and observability, with a strong emphasis on building secure, maintainable applications that comply with industry standards. Experienced in modern technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and hands-on knowledge of full stack development with frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in utilizing microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring data security and integrity. Adept at MLOps, developing ML pipelines, managing production workflows, and integrating advanced analytics into enterprise platforms. Passionate about leveraging technology to drive real-world impact.
